ing.item: Spanish onion; peeled, sliced into 3/8-inch strips

directions.step:
From: "S. Schwartz" <honn@icanect.net>
Date: Thu, 18 Apr 1996 13:29:34 -0400
Recipe By: Cheap Thrills Cuisine (4-11-96)
Peel and slice 1 large Spanish onion into 3/8-inch strips and set aside. Sift 1 cup flour and 1 teaspoon paprika into a bowl. Beat 1 egg yolk into 1 cup of ice-cold water and the quickly blend into the flour. Small lumps may be there, but that's okay. Its better not to over mix. Coat 2 or 3 onion strips at a time and drop into 2 inches of hot oil. Separate with a fork. Fry 1-2 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels and keep warm until ready to serve. Sprinkle with lots of salt and pepper.
